#Assessment

##General Model Specifications and Assumptions
Stock Synthesis version 3.30.03.XX was used to estimate the parameters in the model. R4SS, version 1.XX.X, along with R version 3.3.2 were used to investigate and plot model fits. A summary of the data sources used in the model (details discussed above) is shown in Figure \ref{fig:data_plot}.
